title: Mathematics GCSE Group Session
description: A structured group learning session focused on key GCSE Maths topics including algebra, geometry, and problem-solving. Sessions combine concept revision, exam practice, and collaborative exercises to build confidence and accuracy in a supportive peer environment.
learning_outcomes: Strengthen understanding of GCSE Maths core principles
Improve exam technique through timed question drills
Build confidence in problem-solving and analytical thinking

title: English GCSE One-on-One Session
description: A tailored one-on-one tutoring session focused on improving analytical writing, comprehension, and exam preparation for GCSE English Language and Literature. Each session adapts to the client's specific needs, helping them gain clarity, confidence, and precision in their responses.
learning_outcomes: Enhance reading comprehension and textual analysis skills
Improve essay structure and vocabulary usage
Develop exam confidence through practice papers and feedback

title: AI Tutor Study Support
description: An AI-powered tutoring session designed to provide immediate study assistance, concept explanations, and personalised practice questions across multiple subjects. The AI Tutor offers interactive learning while being supervised by a qualified educator to ensure content quality and relevance.
learning_outcomes: Receive quick, accurate answers to study questions
Reinforce understanding through guided AI-generated exercises
Develop self-paced study habits supported by intelligent feedback

title: Science Tutor Referral Programme
description: Refer a client to our Science Tutoring Programme and earn rewards when they book sessions. The programme offers tailored one-on-one or small group science tutoring designed to simplify complex topics and prepare students for top grades in Biology, Chemistry, and Physics.
learning_outcomes: Build a deeper understanding of scientific concepts
Develop strong exam strategies and practical application skills
Gain confidence in handling higher-level questions
